Title: Enacts the "public housing safety and security act of 2019"
Summary: Enacts the "public housing safety and security act"; grants the division of housing and community renewal the authority to issue grants to public housing authorities or agencies for use in improving security in public housing projects; provides eligible activities for such grants; requires periodic safety inspections and an annual report.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to enacting the "public housing safety and security act of 2019"
